help-language: Language for Wikipedia and user interface
help-mobile-view: [Mobile mode only] Select view: results, extract or categories checkbox filter.
help-categories-switch1: Enable/disable fetching/showing of results categories. Can be slow for big pages.
help-categories-switch2: blinking and click on result disabled during fetch.
help-checkboxfilter-switch: [Desktop mode only] Show/hide categories checkbox filter.
help-redirects-switch1: Show/hide redirects. Fetching can be slow for big pages.
help-redirects-switch2: blinking and click on result disabled during fetch.
help-categoriesclickhover-switch: [Desktop mode only] Show results categories on click or hover.
help-buttonmode-switch: Switch left mouse button click mode: Search (hold CTRL to show categories/redirects), show categories/redirects (hold CTRL to search), open Wikipedia page - middle button always opens Wikipedia - when showing of categories/redirects on hover is enabled, no clicking is needed.
help-intro1: Search for a Wikipedia page and explore all linked Wikipedia pages with pie navigation (click, touch, drag, mousewheel). Click on any result to make it the new search target, show its categories/redirects or open its Wikipedia page (button functions switchable, see below). When categories/redirects mode is enabled, hovering over a title (desktop mode only) or clicking/CTRL-clicking on it (depending on button configuration, see below) will show its categories/redirects.
help-intro2: Results can be filtered by titles and/or categories, just start typing in the corresponding text input fields. Categories can also be filtered with a checkbox filter containing a list of all categories of all results. Missing pages (which are linked to on Wikipedia, but have not yet been created) are marked in red. An extract with image, button to open Wikipedia and categories/redirects (when enabled) is also available.
help-outro1: You can also add one or more of the following parameters directly to the URL, when opening Wiki-Explorer like this:
help-outro6: Search for 'example', switch to mobile mode, language German:
help-outro10: Search for 'example', switch to desktop mode, enable redirects and disable categories:
help-outro13a: mode - Enable mobile/desktop mode, 'desktop' or 'mobile' valid
help-outro13b: lang - UI and Wikipedia language, 'en' or 'de' valid
help-outro13c: categories - Enable/disable results categories, 'on' or 'off' valid
help-outro13d: titlefilter - String to filter titles with
help-outro13e: categoriesfilter - String to filter categories with
help-outro13f: mobileview - Mobile mode only: Switch view mode, valid 'results', 'extract', 'categories'
help-outro13g: checkboxfilter - Desktop mode only: Enable/disable checkbox categories filter, 'on' or 'off' valid
help-outro13i: categoriesmode - Show categories on click or hover, valid 'click' or 'hover'
help-outro13j: buttonmode - On title button click: Search, show categories/redirects or open Wikipedia on button click, valid 'search', 'catsredir' or 'wiki' (details, see above)
help-outro13k: search - Wikipedia page to search for
